request_templates.name: Arkansas Standard FOIA Request
request_templates.description: General purpose records request for Arkansas state agencies
request_templates.template_text:
Dear Records Custodian:

Pursuant to the Arkansas Freedom of Information Act, Arkansas Code Annotated §§ 25-19-101 through 25-19-109, I respectfully request access to and copies of the following public records:

[SPECIFY RECORDS REQUESTED WITH SUFFICIENT DETAIL TO ENABLE CUSTODIAN TO LOCATE WITH REASONABLE EFFORT]

As an Arkansas citizen, I am entitled to inspect and copy public records during regular business hours. If these records are in active use or storage and not immediately available, please certify this fact in writing and set a date and hour within three (3) working days when the records will be available.

If it is necessary to separate exempt from non-exempt information, I understand that you will bear the cost of separation per A.C.A. § 25-19-105(e)(1).

If you determine that some portions of these records are exempt from disclosure, please provide the non-exempt portions and cite the specific statutory authority for any withholdings.

Regarding fees, I understand you may charge reasonable fees for copies. If the total fees will exceed twenty-five dollars ($25.00), please notify me in advance and I will arrange for payment.

If you are not the custodian of these records, please notify me and identify the custodian if known to you.

This request may be processed [IN PERSON/BY MAIL/BY EMAIL/BY FAX] as convenient.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[REQUESTER NAME]
[ARKANSAS ADDRESS]
[CITY, STATE ZIP]
[PHONE NUMBER]
[EMAIL ADDRESS]
[DATE]

request_templates.name: Arkansas Personnel Records Request
request_templates.description: Specific template for requesting one's own personnel or evaluation records
request_templates.template_text:
Dear Records Custodian:

Pursuant to Arkansas Code Annotated § 25-19-105.1, I respectfully request access to and copies of my own personnel records and evaluation records.

I am requesting the following personnel/evaluation records concerning myself:
[SPECIFY RECORDS REQUESTED]

My identifying information:
Full Name: [FULL LEGAL NAME]
Dates of Employment: [START DATE] to [END DATE OR PRESENT]
Position(s) Held: [JOB TITLES]
Department/Division: [WORK LOCATION]
Employee ID (if known): [ID NUMBER]

Per A.C.A. § 25-19-105.1(c)(1), as the subject of these personnel records, I have the right to inspect, copy, and receive copies of my own personnel and evaluation records.

If you deny this request, please be advised that per A.C.A. § 25-19-105.1(c)(2), I may immediately seek an opinion from the Arkansas Attorney General, who must issue an opinion within three (3) working days stating whether your decision is consistent with Arkansas law.

Please provide these records during regular business hours or notify me when they will be available for inspection.

I understand reasonable fees may apply for copying.

Thank you for your compliance with Arkansas transparency law.

Sincerely,
[REQUESTER NAME - MUST MATCH PERSONNEL RECORDS]
[ARKANSAS ADDRESS]
[CITY, STATE ZIP]
[PHONE NUMBER]
[EMAIL ADDRESS]
[DATE]

Enclosed: [COPY OF ID OR OTHER VERIFICATION IF REQUIRED]

request_templates.name: Arkansas Circuit Court FOIA Appeal
request_templates.description: Template for filing circuit court action for denied FOIA request
request_templates.template_text:
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF [COUNTY NAME] COUNTY, ARKANSAS

[PLAINTIFF NAME],           )
  Plaintiff,                )
                           )
  v.                       )  Case No. ____________
                           )
[DEFENDANT AGENCY/OFFICIAL], )
  Defendant.               )

COMPLAINT FOR ENFORCEMENT OF ARKANSAS FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT

TO THE HONORABLE COURT:

Plaintiff [NAME], an Arkansas citizen, brings this action under Arkansas Code Annotated § 25-19-109 to compel compliance with the Arkansas Freedom of Information Act.

1. PARTIES
Plaintiff is an Arkansas citizen entitled to access public records under A.C.A. §§ 25-19-101 et seq.

Defendant [AGENCY/OFFICIAL] is a [DESCRIBE - e.g., state agency, municipal corporation, etc.] subject to the Arkansas FOIA.

2. JURISDICTION AND VENUE
This Court has jurisdiction under A.C.A. § 25-19-109. Venue is proper as the public records are located in [COUNTY] County.

3. FACTUAL BACKGROUND
On [DATE], Plaintiff submitted a written FOIA request to Defendant seeking [DESCRIBE RECORDS].

[On [DATE], Defendant denied the request, stating [REASON FOR DENIAL].]
[OR: Defendant has failed to respond to the request despite [TIME PERIOD] having elapsed.]

4. CLAIMS FOR RELIEF
Defendant's denial/failure to respond violates A.C.A. § 25-19-105 because [EXPLAIN WHY DENIAL IS IMPROPER].

5. REQUEST FOR RELIEF
WHEREFORE, Plaintiff respectfully requests:
a) Order compelling production of the requested records;
b) Declaration that Defendant violated the Arkansas FOIA;
c) Assessment of costs, reasonable attorney's fees, and expenses per A.C.A. § 25-19-109(c) if bad faith is found;
d) Other relief deemed just and proper.

Per A.C.A. § 25-19-109(b), the burden of proving an exemption permits denial is on Defendant.

Respectfully submitted,

_________________________
[ATTORNEY NAME AND BAR NUMBER]
[OR PLAINTIFF SIGNATURE IF PRO SE]
[ADDRESS]
[CITY, STATE ZIP]
[PHONE]
[EMAIL]
Attorney for Plaintiff [OR "Pro Se"]

VERIFICATION
[Include verification by plaintiff that facts are true and correct]
